title: I got LeaverBuster Thunder Storm
body: I got leaverbuster 20min becous in Serbia there was a thunder storm and the power went off in midle of game and i got leave now i need to weit 5 times 20min :@ :@ :@ :@ :@ :@

replies.body: It sounds like your account received a lower priority queue due to consistent leaves on the account.  This time can be used to troubleshoot any issues that could cause an interruption or to.._.weather the storm._  We have a solid guide on how [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)works which can provide some more visibility on how the system works.  Continuing to play without interruptions at this point will improve your standing.  Hope that helps!
